snippet: A federal judge in Pennsylvania issued an opinion on Tuesday declaring unconstitutional President Obama’s executive actions on immigration, but the finding had no immediate effect.
abstract: Federal District Court Judge Arthur J Schwab in Pennsylvania declares Pres Obama's executive actions on immigration unconstitutional; legal experts say it remains unclear how Obama's actions are relevant to deportation case before Schwab.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge in Pennsylvania issued an opinion on Tuesday declaring unconstitutional President Obama’s executive actions on immigration, but the finding had no immediate effect.

headline.main: Federal Judge Calls Obama’s Immigration Actions Unlawful
headline.print_headline: Federal Judge Calls Obama’s Immigration Actions Unlawful
